body:
fixes #13357

This commit factors all the code that is involved in the validation (schema) and parsing of  environment modifications from configuration files in a single place. 

The naming discrepancy between module and compiler configuration (`append-path` vs. `append_path`, `prepend-path` vs. `prepend_path`) has been removed by retaining only the underscored form of the commands. This potentially introduces a backward incompatibility in configuration files, but is anyhow expected to have a low impact.

Unit testing of environment modifications in compilers has been refactored and simplified. Docs have been slightly reworded and updated.
title: Unified environment modifications in config files
